title: Loan Simulator
amountError: Loan amount must be greater than zero.
interestRateError: Interest rate must be greater than zero.
installmentsError: Number of installments must be greater than zero.
startMonthError: Start month must be between 1 and 12.
startYearError: Start year must be greater than zero.
calculationError: Error calculating installments. Please try again.
typeA: Pre-fixed with interest on outstanding balance
typeB: Pre-fixed with interest in the installment
typeC: Post-fixed with interest and correction on outstanding balance
typeD: Post-fixed with interest and correction in the installment
typeE: Post-fixed with interest on outstanding balance and correction in the installment
